name: BoxZone
description:
An automatically controlled crane drops crates at the location of the person, the person must not be hit by a crate. By directing where crates are dropped the screen can be filled. Points are earned by placing down more crates, the more crates placed down the more points are earned to spend in the shop.

Controls

GeneralMute all audio
MMain Menu



Select button play
A, left arrow, Num 4
Select button quit
D, right arrow, Num 6
Press button
Space, Enter, Num 0, Num 5, Num 8Game



Move left
A, left arrow, Num 4
Move right
D, right arrow, Num 6
Jump
W, Space, up arrow, Num 0, Num 5, Num 8Game Over



Select button shop
A, left arrow, Num 4
Select button quit
D, right arrow, Num 6
Press button
Space, Enter, Num 0, Num 5, Num 8Shop



Select item helmet
A, left arrow, Num 4

D, right arrow, Num 6
Select button back
S, down arrow, Num 2
Press button
Space, Enter, Num 0, Num 5, Num 8
